scripts.test:debug: set DEBUG=Y && set HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@login'
scripts.test:demo: set DEBUG=N &&set HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@login'
scripts.test:login: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
